pages.text: $(li)The Hummingbird Feeder is a block that can be used to keep nearby $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/hummingbird)Hummingbirds$(/l) in a small area and boost the effect of their pollination.
$(li)You have to insert Sugar and Water from Water Bottles to the Hummingbird Feeder to active this effect.
